detectors.description:
TwoKToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TwoKToken.sol#81-86) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TwoKToken.sol#83)
detectors.markdown:

detectors.description:
TwoKToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TwoKToken.sol#88-94) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[from] = safeSub(balances[from],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TwoKToken.sol#89)
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TwoKToken.sol#91)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TwoKToken.sol#12)
	- TwoKToken.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TwoKToken.sol#63-65)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TwoKToken.sol#13)
	- TwoKToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TwoKToken.sol#67-69)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TwoKToken.sol#14)
	- TwoKToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TwoKToken.sol#71-73)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- TwoKToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TwoKToken.sol#81-86)
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TwoKToken.sol#15)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- TwoKToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TwoKToken.sol#75-79)
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TwoKToken.sol#16)

safeMul(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TwoKToken.sol#32)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeDiv(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TwoKToken.sol#32-34)
